entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 09:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this evening except snow inland late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few showers in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
